name: LushVibe Midnight Mascara
reviews: Perfect application with the curvy wand!
benefits: Intense black formula with Vitamin E
description: Curvy wand for perfect application
Volumizes, lengthens & conditions
Intense black formula with Vitamin E
Secret to mesmerizing flutters!
LushVibe Midnight Mascara offers bold volume and intense length, transforming your lashes into a stunning focal point.
directionsOfUse: Apply from root to tip with a zigzag motion.
allIngredients: Aqua, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Acrylates, Beeswax, Ferric Oxide, Candelilla Wax, Stearic Acid, Carnauba Wax, Vitamin E

name: LushVibe Bold 4 IN 1 Kajal
description: LushVibe Bold 4 IN 1 Kajal delivers intense color with a smooth, creamy texture.
Waterproof formula ensures long-lasting wear without smudging.
Perfectly defines eyes while conditioning lashes with Vitamin E.
directionsOfUse: Apply on waterline or lash line for bold eye makeup.
allIngredients: Paraffin, Petrolatum, Vitamin E, Iron Oxides

name: LushVibe Bollywood Filter Primer
highlights: Blurs out fine lines and pores
description: LushVibe Bollywood Filter Primer blurs imperfections and creates a poreless base.
Light, non-greasy formula keeps skin hydrated all day.
Perfect for a smooth, radiant finish.
directionsOfUse: Apply a thin layer on clean skin before foundation.
allIngredients: Aloe Vera Extract, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane

name: LushVibe Hair Nourishing Serum
description: LushVibe Hair Nourishing Serum deeply hydrates and controls frizz.
Lightweight, non-greasy formula provides smooth shiny hair all day.
Suitable for all hair types.
directionsOfUse: Apply a few drops on damp or dry hair, focusing on ends.
allIngredients: Argan Oil, Cyclopentasiloxane, Dimethicone, Fragrance

name: LushVibe Hair Nourishing Serum
description: LushVibe Hair Nourishing Serum deeply hydrates and controls frizz.

benefits: Uplifts mood with fresh floral notes
description: LushVibe Fragrance Bloom is a fresh floral perfume that lasts all day.

directionsOfUse: Spray on pulse points for lasting fragrance.

reviews: Refreshing citrus scent, perfect for summer.

description: LushVibe Citrus Essence Body Mist is a refreshing spray infused with citrus oils.

description: LushVibe Nail Care Base Coat strengthens nails and provides a smooth base for polish.

Gentle and nourishing, suitable for regular use.
directionsOfUse: Apply one coat on clean nails before nail polish.

reviews: Dries polish fast and keeps shine.
